wikipedia_page.main:
Derek Leaver (13 November 1930 – 24 March 2013) was an English footballer who played as an inside forward.
Leaver played for Blackburn Rovers, AFC Bournemouth and Crewe Alexandra.He signed for Mossley from Macclesfield Town in the 1957–58 season, making seven appearances.

response: * 24 March 2013: Derek Leaver, 82, former Blackburn Rovers, A.F.C. Bournemouth and Crewe Alexandra midfielder.

Derek Leaver FRSE MRSC ARIC (16 May 1929 – 24 October 1990) was a 20th-century British chemist.
